content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, thank you for your interest in my apartment. I am certainly glad to have the opportunity to discuss the rental price with you. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am a student and I am looking for the lowest possible rental price. I am dependable and responsible, so I would like to make a good impression on you. What is your rental price?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Well, Max, I appreciate your honesty and your interest in my apartment. I must say that I am not willing to lower the rental price for this apartment. It is a very desirable location, and I believe that it is worth the price. However, I am open to discussing the terms of the lease and any additional fees that may be required. Would you be willing to discuss these details with me?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand your point of view, but I am looking for the lowest possible rental price. If I can't afford the current price, I will have to look for another option. I am willing to negotiate, but I can't accept the current price. Is there any room for negotiation?

Also, I would like to make sure that I am on good terms with my landlord. I am a responsible person and I want to maintain a good relationship with you. Is there anything I can do to make myself more appealing as a tenant?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
I understand your desire for a lower rental price, Max. However, as I mentioned earlier, I am not willing to lower the price of this apartment. It is a very desirable location, and I believe that it is worth the price.

That being said, I do appreciate your interest in my apartment and your willingness to negotiate. I am open to discussing the terms of the lease and any additional fees that may be required. If you have any specific concerns or questions, please feel free to bring them up during our discussion.

As for your desire to maintain a good relationship with me, I appreciate your honesty and your willingness to be responsible as a tenant. I am looking for a dependable and responsible tenant, and I believe that you would be a good fit for my apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
